title: I can't select a champ in champ select
body: When I find a game, I can't select or ban a champ. I have tried restarting my client, and I was wondering if anyone had a solution

replies.body:
Hmmmm it sounds like your client may be having a hard time keeping a stable connection when you get into the actual game lobby. Since you client needs to make a new connection with the game lobby, it might not be grabbing all of the data correctly which is preventing you from banning or selecting champs. 

Look over the steps in our [**Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) so we can try to get you a more stable connection. Let me know if you have any questions.
